SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies2013.pdf: Página 48
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
48 
HEURISTIC 4. MEREOLOGY III 
Heuristic 4 (mereology reuse III). If the CQ refers to a time relation (using the words ‘in’, ‘during’, etc.), 
then an implemented mereology should be reused. 
I1 
Left point 
Right point 
It is equal to I1 
It is inside I1 
It is overlaps with I1
